column1: 20,Purchase Apple iPhone 15 and Complete Checkout Process,"Navigate to home, select iPhone 15, choose options, add to cart, fill checkout details, and verify order completion.","Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 3: Click on link Apple -> Navigate to page 'category page#category/{*}'
Step 10: Click on span dynamicObject (Link2) -> Navigate to page 'cart page#cart'
Step 12: Fill out the checkout information form and proceed to payment

column2: - Step 1: Click on button ProceedToCheckout -> Navigate to page 'checkout info#checkout/info'
- Step 4: Enter input value in input Email
- Step 5: Click on button ContinueToShipping -> Navigate to page 'checkout page#checkout/shipping-address'
- Step 9: Enter input value in input FirstName
- Step 12: Enter input value in input LastName
- Step 15: Enter input value in input Address
- Step 18: Enter input value in input ZipCode
- Step 21: Enter input value in input City
- Step 24: Enter input value in input State
- Step 26: Enter input value in input Phone

column1: Step 13: Click on button CompleteOrder -> Navigate to page 'thank you page#thank-you/{*}'
Step 14: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
